vlive.english: "Did you pick a topic for the channel?"

vlive.korean: 저한테 주제를 주면 제가 여덟 마디 정도... If you give me a topic, I'll write about eight words. 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray Kids 스트레이키즈에게 자유시간이 생기면? #스타로드 11
vlive.english: If you give me a topic, I'll write about eight words.

examples.korean: the most authoritative book on the subject 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 주제에 대한 가장 권위 있는 책 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the most authoritative book on the subject Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The information available on the subject is sparse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 주제에 대한 정보는 드물다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The information available on the subject is sparse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Innumerable books have been written on the subject. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 주제에 대해 무수한 책들이 쓰여 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Innumerable books have been written on the subject. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He chose an uncontroversial topic for his speech. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 연설을 위해 논란의 여지가 적은 주제를 골랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He chose an uncontroversial topic for his speech. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He forbade them from mentioning the subject again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그들이 다시 그 주제를 언급하는 것을 금했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He forbade them from mentioning the subject again. Add to Wordbook
